column1: Find the next scheduled SpaceX Starship launch date on spacex.com
Visit nasa.gov and locate the date of the next scheduled Mars rover mission update
Go to wikipedia.org and find the current population estimate for Earth
Open google.com/trends and identify the top trending search term today
Visit timeanddate.com and find the date of the next full moon
Go to weather.gov and check the current temperature in New York City
Open britannica.com and find the birth year of Albert Einstein
Visit worldometers.info and note the current global population growth rate
Go to nobelprize.org and find the name of the most recent Physics Nobel Prize winner
